scripts.dev: concurrently "cd ../ && cd firebase && firebase emulators:start --import="emulatorData" --export-on-exit="emulatorData" " "cd ../ && cd firebase/functions && yarn tsc -w" "cd ../ && cd hasura && hasura console" "cd ../ && cd local-polyfils && node . " "cd ../ && cd deamon && yarn dev "
scripts.build: cd packages/source && yarn nx run terminal:build:production && mv dist/packages/terminal dist/packages/public && cp -R dist/packages/public ../serverless
